request.description: Demonstrates the retrieval of customers (does not return records beyond the first page)
Demonstrates the retrieval of a set of customers by specifying the offset and count
Demonstrates the retrieval of a set of Customers based on a filter

item.name: Get Records using a Complex Filter

request.url: http://localhost/Sage300WebApi/-/SAMLTD/AR/Customers?$filter=BalanceDueInCustomerCurrency gt 1000.00m and DateOfLastInvoice gt datetime'2016-12-31T12:00' and AccountType eq 'BalanceForward'
request.description: Demonstrates the retrieval of a set of Customers based on a complex filter dealing with a dollar amount, a date and a presentation item.
Demonstrates the retrieval of a Customer using the customer number

request.description: Demonstrates the creation of an AR Invoice Batch

Demonstrates retrieving metadata to list all available resources
